Label: Study Identifier
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: ADSL.STUDYID

Label: Unique Subject Identifier
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: ADSL.USUBJID

Label: ADSL core variables are carried through all ADaM Datasets. See Core Variable column on the ADSL specs for variables kept on all ADaM datasets
Analysis Sequence Number
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: After sorting dataset by the KEYS, set to 1 for the first record per subject, then incremented by 1 for each subsequent record.

Label: Sequence Number
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: TR.TRSEQ. Null for PARAMCD = 'SUMDIV'.

Label: Category
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: TR.TRCAT. Carried forward onto PARAMCD = 'SUMDIV' from records used to create the record.

Label: Lab Test or Examination Short Name
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: TR.TRTESTCD. Null for PARAMCD = 'SUMDIV'.

Label: Tumor/Lesion Assessment Test Name
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: TR.TRTEST. Null for PARAMCD = 'SUMDIV'.

Label: Character Result/Finding in Std Format
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: TR.TRSTRESC. Null for PARAMCD = 'SUMDIV'.
Notes: Note: Lesions that are "too small to measure" have TRORRES/TRSTRESC/TRSTRESN set to 5 at the SDTM level.

Label: Numeric Result/Finding in Standard Units
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: TR.TRSTRESN. Null for PARAMCD = 'SUMDIV'.

Label: Standard Units
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: TR.TRSTRESU. Null for PARAMCD = 'SUMDIV'.

Label: Completion Status
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: TR.TRSTAT. Null for PARAMCD = 'SUMDIV'.

Label: Group ID
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: TR.TRGRPID. Null for PARAMCD = 'SUMDIV'.

Label: Link ID
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: TR.TRLNKID. Null for PARAMCD = 'SUMDIV'.

Label: Location of the Tumor/Lesion
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: SUPPTR.QVAL where QNAM=TLLOC. Null for PARAMCD = 'SUMDIV'.

Label: Tumor/Lesion Location Details
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: SUPPTR.QVAL where QNAM=TLLOC. Null for PARAMCD = 'SUMDIV'.
XL Comments: ML 12/12/24: We do not have QNAM= 'TRLOCDTL' in SUPPTR. Can you update accordingly?

Label: Target Lesion Status
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: SUPPTR.QVAL where QNAM='TLRES. Null for PARAMCD = 'SUMDIV'.
XL Comments: ML 12/12/24: We need to update SDTM specs to map TLCDB.TLRES to SUPPTR.TLRES.

Label: Visit Number
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: TR.VISITNUM. Carried forward onto PARAMCD = 'SUMDIV' from records used to create the record.

Label: Visit Name
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: TR.VISIT. Carried forward onto PARAMCD = 'SUMDIV' from records used to create the record.

Label: Date/Time of Tumor/Lesion Measurement
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: TR.TRDTC.  Null for PARAMCD = 'SUMDIV', as TRDTC could differ among records used in the calculation.

Label: Study Day of Tumor/Lesion Measurement
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: TR.TRDY.  Null for PARAMCD = 'SUMDIV', as TRDY could differ among records used in the calculation.

Label: Evaluator
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: TR.TREVAL. Carried forward onto PARAMCD = 'SUMDIV' from records used to create the record.

Label: Evaluator Identifier
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: TR.TREVALID. Carried forward onto PARAMCD = 'SUMDIV' from records used to create the record.

Label: Parameter Category 1
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Set to TR.TRCAT.
Carried forward onto PARAMCD = 'SUMDIV' from records used to create the record.

Label: Parameter Category 2
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Set to TR.TREVAL.
Carried forward onto PARAMCD = 'SUMDIV' from records used to create the record.

Label: Parameter (N)
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Assigned based on PARAMCD, as per the codelist

Label: Parameter Code
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Assign as per VLM.

Label: Parameter
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Assigned as the decoded version of PARAMCD, as per the codelist

Label: Analysis Visit (N)
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Equivalent to TR.VISITNUM. For derived parameters, carried forward from source records.

Label: Analysis Visit
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Set to TR.VISIT in proper-case. For derived parameters, carried forward from source records.

Label: Analysis Date
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Within a given PARAMCD and VISIT, the chronologically earliest TRDTC is identified. ADT is set to the numeric form of that earliest TRDTC, as a SAS numeric date.

Label: Analysis Relative Day
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Where ADSL.STAGE=EXPANSION:
If ADT < ADSL.RANDDT then calculated as (ADT - RANDDT). 
If ADT >= ADSL.RANDDT then calculated as (ADT - RANDDT + 1).
Null if ADSL.RANDDT is null.

Where ADSL.STAGE=ESCALATION:
If ADT < ADSL.TRTSDT then calculated as (ADT - TRTSDT). 
If ADT >= ADSL.TRTSDT then calculated as (ADT - TRTSDT + 1).
Null if ADSL.TRTSDT is null.
XL Comments: ML 12/12/24: How is this handled for Escalation cohorts which are not randomized? We should use TRTSDT for such subjects.

Label: Analysis Value
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: See VLM for details.

Label: Analysis Value (C)
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Populated only for TR.TRTESTCD = 'TUMSTATE' or "SUMDIAM"
Set to TR.TRSTRESC.

Label: Baseline Record Flag
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Populated only for PARAMCD ="SUMDIR" and "SUMDIV".   
Where ADSL.STAGE=EXPANSION:
Set to "Y" on the last non-missing value prior to randomization (ADSL.RANDDT). 

If ADT = RANDDT, assume the assessment was performed prior to randomization and is eligible for selection

Where ADSL.STAGE=ESCALATION:
Set to "Y" on the last non-missing value prior to treatment start (ADSL.TRTSDT). 

If ADT = TRTSDT, assume the assessment was performed prior to treatment start and is eligible for selection

Note for PARAMCD='SUMDIR' only count records where ACEPTFL=Y
XL Comments: ML 12/12/24: For Escalation subjects use TRTSDT and for randomized subjects use RANDDT. This update should be made across all efficacy ADaMs.

Label: Post-Baseline Record Flag
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Populated only for PARAMCD ="SUMDIR" and "SUMDIV".   

Where ADSL.STAGE=EXPANSION:
Set to 'Y' on any record determined to have occurred after randomization (ADT > RANDDT).

Where ADSL.STAGE=ESCALATION:
Set to 'Y' on any record determined to have occurred after treatment start (ADT > TRTSDT).

Label: Baseline Value
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Populated only for PARAMCD ="SUMDIR" and "SUMDIV".   

if TREVAL=INDEPENDENT ASSESSOR then set to numeric SUPPTR.QVAL where QNAM=TORRESR and corresponding SUPPTR.QVAL where QNAM=TREFTYP="BASELINE"  when combining onto the PARAMCD='SUMDIR' record within a subject, VISIT, TREVALID, TRCAT

If TREVAL=INVESTIGATOR then do:
Set to ADTR.AVAL from the record where ADTR.ABLFL = 'Y' within a given PARAMCD. 
Populated on all records (regardless of timing relative to baseline)

Label: Change from Baseline
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Populated only for PARAMCD ="SUMDIR" and "SUMDIV".   

If TREVAL=INDEPENDENT ASSESSOR then set to TR.TRSTRESN where TR.TRTESTCD="CHGBL" and populate for corresponding TPARAMCD=SUMDIR within a subject, VISIT, TREVALID, TRCAT

If TREVAL=INVESTIGATOR then do:
Calculate as: AVAL - BASE.
Only populated on post-baseline records (where ADTR.PSBLFL = 'Y').

Label: Percent Change from Baseline
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Populated only for PARAMCD ="SUMDIR" and "SUMDIV".   

If TREVAL=INDEPENDENT ASSESSOR then set to TR.TRSTRESN where TR.TRTESTCD="PCHGBL" and populate for corresponding PARAMCD=SUMDIR within a subject, VISIT, TREVALID, TRCAT

If TREVAL=INVESTIGATOR then do:
Calculate as: 100*(AVAL - BASE)/(BASE) where AVAL is non-missing and BASE is not missing or 0. 
Only populated on post-baseline records (where ADTR.PSBLFL = 'Y').

Label: Nadir Value
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Populated on SUMDIV and SUMDIR records.

For PARAMCD=SUMDIV:
If ABLFL = 'Y', set to AVAL.
This value is retained on all subsequent records.
If AVAL < NADIR then, on the next record, NADIR is set equal to that lesser AVAL (update NADIR for the subsequent record to be equal to AVAL from the current record; do not update NADIR on the current record), and continue retaining that value of NADIR on subsequent records, until an even lower value is encountered. Repeated as above any time a record is encountered where AVAL < NADIR.

For PARAMCD=SUMDIR:
if TREVAL=INDEPENDENT ASSESSOR then set to numeric SUPPTR.QVAL where QNAM=TORRESR and corresponding SUPPTR.QVAL where QNAM=TREFTYP="NADIR"  when combining onto the PARAMCD=SUMDIR record within a subject, VISIT, TREVALID, TRCAT

Label: Change from Nadir
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Populated only for PARAMCD ="SUMDIR" and "SUMDIV".   

If TREVAL=INDEPENDENT ASSESSOR then set to TR.TRSTRESN where TR.TRTESTCD="CHGNAD" and populate for corresponding PARAMCD=SUMDIR within a subject, VISIT, TREVALID, TRCAT

If TREVAL=INVESTIGATOR then do:
Calculated as: AVAL- NADIR
Only populated on post-baseline (where PSBLFL = 'Y' )  records.

Label: Percent Change from Nadir
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Populated only for PARAMCD ="SUMDIR" and "SUMDIV".   

If TREVAL=INDEPENDENT ASSESSOR then set to TR.TRSTRESN where TR.TRTESTCD="PCHGNAD" and populate for corresponding PARAMCD=SUMDIR within a subject, VISIT, TREVALID, TRCAT

If TREVAL=INVESTIGATOR then do:
Calculated as: 100*(AVAL-NADIR) /NADIR
Null if NADIR = 0. 
Only populated on post-baseline (where PSBLFL = 'Y' ) SUMDIV records.

Label: On or Prior to 1st PD Flag
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Populated on records with TREVAL in ('INVESTIGATOR' 'INDEPENDENT ASSESSOR')
If TREVAL='INVESTIGATOR' and TRCAT='RECIST 1.1'  then set to "Y" if ADT <= ADSL.INVPDDT or INVPDDT is missing.

else If TREVAL='INVESTIGATOR' and TRCAT='RECIST 1.1'  then set to "Y" if ADT <= ADSL.PCIVPDDT or PCIVPDDT is missing.

Else if TREVAL='INDEPENDENT ASSESSOR' then set to "Y" if TRCAT='RECIST 1.1' and ACEPTFL='Y' and ( ADT <= ADSL.BIRCPDDT or BIRCPDDT is missing).

Else if TREVAL='INDEPENDENT ASSESSOR' then set to "Y" if TRCAT='PCWG3' and ACEPTFL='Y' and ( ADT <= ADSL.PCWGPDDT or PCWGPDDT is missing).
XL Comments: ML 12/12/24: The current specs is only written for TREVAL= "INVESTIGATOR". But we also need to consider TREVAL= "INDEPENDENT ASSESSOR" since 002 has BICR data.

Label: Prior to 1st Anti-Cancer Therapy Flag
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Set to 'Y' if ADT <=ADSL.FSBACTDT or FSBACTDT is missing

Label: Accepted Record Flag Imputed
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Only populate for records where TRCEVAL=INDEPENDENT ASSESSOR
Set to TR.TRACPTFL

If a subject is missing TR.TRACPTFL for both TREVALID='READER 1' and 'READER 2' records within the same visit, TRCAT, and TRSPID then set ACEPTFL=Y for TREVALID='READER 1' record.

Label: Analysis Flag 01 (Max Pct Reduction SoD)
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Flags the post-baseline sum of diameter record with the largest %reduction from baseline that occurs prior to start of new anti-cancer therapy and on or prior to the first PD.

For records with PARAMCD = 'SUMDIV', set to 'Y' on the record with the smallest/most negative non-missing PCHG where PSBLFL = 'Y' and PREPDFL = 'Y' and PREACTFL = 'Y'. If more than one record with the same low PCHG, flag the earlier record.

For records with PARAMCD = 'SUMDIR', set to 'Y' on the record with the smallest/most negative non-missing PCHG where PSBLFL = 'Y' and PREPDFL = 'Y' and PREACTFL = 'Y' and ACEPTFL='Y'. If more than one record with the same low PCHG, flag the earlier record.

Label: Criterion 1 Evaluation Result Flag
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Flags Sum of Diameters records that indiciate a post-baseline reduction in SoD prior to subsequent anti-cancer history and prior to or on first PD.

Set to "Y" on records where (PARAMCD = 'SUMDIV'  or (PARAMCD = 'SUMDIR' and ACEPTFL='Y') ) and PSBLFL = 'Y' and non-missing CHG < 0 and PREACTFL = 'Y' and PREPDFL = 'Y'.

Label: Analysis Criterion 1
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Set to "Post-Baseline Reduction in SoD" on records where CRIT1FL = 'Y'

Label: Criterion 2 Evaluation Result Flag
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Flags Sum of Diameters records that show a >=20% increase in SoD relative to Nadir, indicating disease progression of target lesions. Only considers records that are prior to subsequent anti-cancer therapy.

Set to "Y" on records where (PARAMCD = 'SUMDIV'   or (PARAMCD = 'SUMDIR' and ACEPTFL='Y')) and PSBLFL = 'Y' and PREACTFL = 'Y' and PCHGNAD >= 20.

Label: Analysis Criterion 2
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Set to "20% increase in SoD from Nadir" on records where CRIT2FL = 'Y'

Label: Criterion 3 Evaluation Result Flag
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Flags Sum of Diameters records that show a >=30% decrease in SoD relative to baseline, indicating a partial response of target lesions. Only considers scans prior to first PD and prior to subsequent anti-cancer treatment.

Set to "Y" on records where (PARAMCD = 'SUMDIV'   or (PARAMCD = 'SUMDIR' and ACEPTFL='Y') ) and PSBLFL = 'Y' and  non-missing PCHG <= -30 and PREPDFL = 'Y' and PREACTFL = 'Y'.

Label: Analysis Criterion 3
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Set to "30% decrease in SoD from Baseline" on records where CRIT3FL = 'Y'
